column2: "Hmmm, he's not here either. I wonder where in the world he could have gone...."
"Oh hey, are you an ARKS too? What brings you to a strange place like this?"
"Sorry, I forgot to introduce myself. I'm Casra, an ARKS member too."
"I've been looking for that research student who went missing around here..."
"If you find anything please be sure to tell me."
"I need to keep looking. Take care, <%me>."
